RecipeDef.label: Restore hearing: cellular regenerative surgery
RecipeDef.description: Cellular regenerative otologic surgery (CROS) is an experimental glitterworld surgery that uses mechanites to repair damaged hair cells in the inner ear, restoring hearing to a person with permanent hearing loss. The procedure is expensive and not widely available, but has shown promising results in restoring hearing, even in very severe cases.
